attributes.action: Government to offer financial assistance to business in the hospitality sector
attributes.additional_details: People in the UK are not discouraged from gathering in crowded places like restaurants, bars, bistro, pubs, hotels and B&B. However, they count for 2.9 Million employed people at risk of losing their jobs.
attributes.background: For the UK government to provide economic assistance to businesses and staff employed in the hospitality industry, who are suffering unforeseen financial challenges that could have a profound effect on hundreds of thousands of people employed in the sector.
